name: Shadow Heroes: Vengeance In Flames (Canceled)
blurb: Frustration with micromanagement leads to a NEW take on Real Time Strategy Genre! Shadow Heroes: Vengeance in Flames

rewards.reward: THE SUPPORTER! \r\n==============================Every dollar you can pledge helps us develop this amazing game! You get a "Supporter" tier badge in our community. You will also get access to the members area of the Shadow Heroes forum.

THE NON-GAMER SUPPORTER! ==============================We appreciate your help and consideration and understand you may not be interested the game, but you love the story as well as the lore. This pledge tier will entitle you to a digital copy of the game story as well as a wallpaper featuring every character.

THE DIGITAL SUPPORTER! ============================== You get a digital copy of Shadow Heroes: Vengeance in Flames and the digital version of the world map, plus $5 worth of Kasai, our in-game currency, to purchase items and addons. You also get a "Backer" tier badge to use in our community forums.

THE EARLY BIRD! ==============================You get a digital copy of Shadow Heroes: Vengeance in Flames, a digital version of Hendrika's world map and placed in our closed beta pool! Play the game before it's released and give us your feedback. Tell us what works and what doesn't work for you. You also get a "Beta Tester" tier badge to use in our community forums.

THE BETA TESTER! ============================== You get a digital copy of Shadow Heroes: Vengeance in Flames, a digital version of Hendrika's world map and placed in our closed beta pool! Play the game before it's released and give us your feedback. Tell us what works and what doesn't work for you. You also get a "Beta Tester" tier badge to use in our community forums.

THE DIGITAL SCHOLAR! ============================== You get a digital copy of Shadow Heroes: Vengeance in Flames, a digital version of Hendrika's world map, plus a digital copy of the Shadow Heroes novella, written by the game's Lead Writer and placed in our closed beta pool! You also get a "Scholar"  tier badge to use in our community forums.

THE DIGITAL COLLECTOR!\r\n============================== You get a digital copy of Shadow Heroes: Vengeance in Flames, a digital version of Hendrika's world map, a digital copy of the Shadow Heroes novella, a digital copy of the soundtrack, the digital artbook and placed in our closed beta pool! \r\nYou also get a "Collector" tier badge to use in our community forums.

THE MASTER SCHOLAR! ============================== You get a digital copy of Shadow Heroes: Vengeance in Flames, printed and digital copies of the novella plus a digital copy of the soundtrack, digital artbook and placed in our closed beta pool! You get a "Master Scholar" tier badge to use in our community forums. You also get $10 of Kasai, our in-game currency.

THE COMPLETIONIST! ============================== You get a digital copy of Shadow Heroes: Vengeance in Flames, A physical poster of your favourite character and placed in our closed beta pool! You also get digital copies of the novella, soundtrack, artbook and map. You get a "Completionist" tier badge on our community and get $20 of Kasai!

THE DELUXE EDITION! ============================== You get a digital copy of Shadow Heroes: Vengeance in Flames, the physical novella, printed map, poster of your favourite character, physical game soundtrack,placed in our closed beta pool and a Shadow Heroes t-shirt! You get a "Deluxe Backer" tier badge in our community forum.

THE NON-GAMER TIER! ============================== You want all the cool Shadow Heroes swag, but aren't a gamer? No problem! You'll get the physical novella, printed map, poster of your favourite character, physical game soundtrack and a Shadow Heroes t-shirt ! It also gets your name in the credits and the \u201cSupporter\u201d badge on the forums.

THE LIEUTENANT! ============================== Get a digital copy of the game, digital novella, digital map, digital soundtrack, digital artbook, placed in our closed beta pool and have a Kickstarter exclusive unit skin to show off! You also get the "Lieutenant" badge in our community.

ANCIENT! ============================== Get a digital copy of the game, digital novella, map, 
soundtrack and artbook , placed in our closed beta pool and
have one of the world's monuments made after your likeness! 
Your face will be part of the history of Hendrika as one of 
its many statues! You also get the "Ancient" badge in our 
community forums.

MASTER COLLECTOR! ============================== You get a digital copy of Shadow Heroes: Vengeance in Flames, physical novella, physical soundtrack, physical map, character print of all game units and one unit statuette of your choosing! You also get the "Master Collector" badge to use in our community forums, your name in the credits and guaranteed access to closed alpha testing!

CELEBRITY! ============================== Get a digital copy of the game, digital novella, digital map, digital soundtrack, access to beta and have an npc in the game in your likeness! You will appear in the single-player campaign as a minor character that is in some way part of the story. You also get the "Celebrity" badge to use in our community forums, your name in the credits and guaranteed access to closed alpha testing!

THE MAKER! ============================== Get a digital copy of the game, digital novella, digital map, digital soundtrack, digital artbook, access to beta and create a new unit for the game! Give your idea for a new enemy and we will design it together to integrate it into the game! You also get the "Maker" badge to use in our community forums, your name in the credits and guaranteed access to closed alpha testing!
